tables.command: sqoop import -Dmapreduce.output.basename={environment}_{table} -Dmapreduce.job.queuename=root.dataeng --connect 'jdbc:oracle:thin:@{serverName}:{port}/{service}' --username '{username}' --query "SELECT A.COD_OPS,A.MONCOD,A.COD_TIPO,A.COD_DESTINO,A.COD_ESTADO,A.LIQ_BKT,A.NRO_BANKTRADE,A.IMPORTE,REPLACE(A.BENEFICIARIO,'|',' ') as BENEFICIARIO,A.TPOCTA,A.SUCURSAL,A.CUENTA,A.NUMERO,A.OBSERVA,REPLACE(A.ORDENANTE,'|',' ') AS ORDENANTE,A.FECHA_VALOR,A.FECHA_MT,A.ACCT_NO,A.FECHA_LIQ,A.FECHA_MODIF,A.USUARIO,A.ENVIO_MAIL,A.F_ENVIO_MAIL,A.NUEVO_RUBRO,A.ASIENTO_CONTABLE,A.CON_FONDOS,A.F_ASIENTO_CONTABLE,A.COD_PRODUCTO,A.USUARIO_VERIFICA,A.FECHA_VERIFICA,A.VISTA,A.PLAZO,A.F_VENCIMIENTO,A.SUMA_PAGOS,A.SALDO_PAGO,A.LIQUIDA_PARCIALES,A.OPP_MAX_SEQ,A.ESTADO_MAIL,A.PAIS_ORIGEN,A.PAIS_BENEF,A.CUENTA_BP,A.NUP,A.COD_SWIFT_R,A.DETALLE_SWIFT,A.MOTIVO_OBSERVA,A.TIPO_CTA_FONDO,A.NRO_FONDO,A.TIPO_CLIENTE,A.TIPO_DOC,A.NRO_DOC,A.TIPO_PERSONA,A.TIPO_IVA,A.EMPLEADO,A.ID_SWIFT_CORRE,A.OBSERVA_ELIMINA,A.TIMESTAMP,A.FECHA_VUELCO72,A.F_AVISO_SINLIQ,A.ES_COM_A5655,A.COD_OPS_REL,A.SECUENCIA_REL,A.COD_PROD_ALTAIR,A.ACREDIT_AUTOM,A.INFORMA_F2040,A.NRO_DOC_70,A.NRO_LEGAJO_CITI,A.NRO_CUENTA_CITI,A.RAZON_SOCIAL_CITI,A.OP_CITY,A.TIPO_DOC_CITY,A.NRO_DOC_CITY,A.NRO_LEGAJO_CITI_ANT,A.DOMICILIO_ORD,A.ACREDIT_AUTOM_CTRL,A.CUADRANTE,A.SUBSEGMENTO,A.ID_ICS,A.FECHA_NAC,A.CAPITAL_CANCELADO,A.CAPITAL_PENDIENTE,A.INTERESES_BKT,A.ULT_SECUENCIA_BKT,A.ID_BOL_CA,A.ID_BOL_NORMAL,A.ID_BOLETO_CITI,A.ID_SWIFT_GPII,A.SRP,A.TASA_TNA,A.TASA_CFT,A.LIQ_BKT_PASIVO,A.TRF_ASOCIADAS,A.TASA_TEA,A.GENERA_COMPROB,A.LOCALIDAD_ORD,A.SUBPROD_ALTAIR,A.ES_SML,A.CONDICION_CORRE,A.FECHA, to_char(B.F_VERIF, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PARTITION_DATE FROM {environment}.OPP_OPS_PAGOS B JOIN {environment}.{table} A ON A.COD_OPS = B.COD_OPS WHERE to_char(B.F_VERIF, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_char(to_date('{partition_date}','YYYY-MM-DD')-10,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND \$CONDITIONS" --bindir '{zonda_dir}/sqoop/{database}/{table}' --target-dir '{data_lake_server}{landing_path}/partition_date={partition_date}' --compression-codec org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec --delete-target-dir --fields-terminated-by '|' --num-mappers 1 --password '{password}' --hive-delims-replacement ' ' --split-by "{split_field}" --verbose

'{zonda_dir}/sqoop/{database}/{table}' --target-dir '{data_lake_server}{landing_path}/partition_date={partition_date}' --compression-codec org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec --delete-target-dir sqoop import -Dmapreduce.output.basename={environment}_{table} -Dmapreduce.job.queuename=root.dataeng --connect 'jdbc:oracle:thin:@{serverName}:{port}/{service}' --username '{username}' --query "SELECT A.ID_BOL,A.ORIGEN,A.NRO_ORIGEN,A.NRO_PROPUESTA,A.NRO_BOLETO,A.COMPRA_VENTA,A.ESPECIE,A.CLIENTE,A.TIPO_DOC,A.NRO_DOC,A.RAZONSOCIAL_CLIENTE,A.PAIS_RESIDENCIA,A.MERCADO,A.TIPO,A.PLAZO,A.PUESTO,A.PRECIO_MOSTRADOR,A.SECTOR,A.CIERRE_COT,A.CORR_OBS,A.PAIS,A.INSTRUMENTO_BCRA,A.INSTRUMENTO_RECI,A.CORRESP_MAE,A.PAGADOR_BENEF,A.FECHA_EMBARQUE,A.FECHA_LIQ_MON,A.FECHA_LIQ_MON_PAGO,A.COTIZACION,A.ESTADO,A.DESC_ERROR,A.USU_CARGA,A.USU_MODIF,A.FECHA_MODIF,A.FECHA_ACREDI,A.SECUENCIA_ORIGEN,A.ORIGEN_VINC,A.COD_OPS_VINC,A.SECUENCIA_VINC,A.TASA,A.ESAPODERADO,A.TIPO_DOC_APODERADO,A.NRO_DOC_APODERADO,A.CODIGO_PAIS_APODERADO,A.RAZONSOCIAL_NO_RESIDENTE,A.TIPO_DOC_INSC,A.NRO_DOC_INSC,A.FECHA_LIQ_SAM,A.BOLETO_ANTICIPO,A.ENT_FIN_ANTICIPO,A.FECHA_LIQ_ANTICIPO,A.FECHA_NAC,A.DJAI,A.DJAI_EXCEP,A.DJAS,A.DJAS_EXCEP,A.ES_SML,A.DEVOLUCION,A.MOTIVO_ELIMINACION,A.OBSERVACION_ELIMINACION,A.FECHA_REF_BCRA,A.F_INGRESO_FONDO,A.APLICACION_VERSION,A.DESC_ERROR_TECNICO,A.ACUMULA_SALDO,A.NRO_OPERACION,A.CONCEPTOBCRA_SALIDA,A.TIPO_OPERACION,A.ACREDIT_AUTOM,A.ID_PCC,A.FECHA_VENC_FONDOS,A.OP_PREVIA,A.NRO_FORM_INVERSION,A.EMP_VINCULADA,A.MONTOME,A.MONTOMN,A.FECHA_CARGA,  to_char(B.F_VERIF, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PARTITION_DATE FROM {environment}.OPP_OPS_PAGOS B JOIN {environment}.{table} A ON B.ID_BOLETO = A.ID_BOL  WHERE to_char(B.F_VERIF,'YYYY-MM-DD') ='{partition_date}' AND \$CONDITIONS" --bindir '{zonda_dir}/sqoop/{database}/{table}' --target-dir '{data_lake_server}{landing_path}/partition_date={partition_date}' --compression-codec org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec --delete-target-dir --fields-terminated-by '|' --num-mappers 1 --password '{password}' --hive-delims-replacement ' ' --split-by "{split_field}" --verbose

sqoop import -Dmapreduce.output.basename={environment}_{table} -Dmapreduce.job.queuename=root.dataeng --connect 'jdbc:oracle:thin:@{serverName}:{port}/{service}' --username '{username}' --query "SELECT DISTINCT A.ID_BOL, A.IMPORTE, A.CONCEPTOBCRA, A.PERMISO_EMBARQUE, A.ID_DET, A.FECHA_EMBARQUE, A.ACUMULA_SALDO, A.DJAI, A.DJAI_EXCEP, A.TIPO_DEC, A.COD_OBSERVACION, A.OBSERVACION, A.FECHA_VENC, A.GESTION_COBRO, A.BS_POS_ARANC, to_char(B.F_VERIF, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PARTITION_DATE FROM {environment}.OPP_OPS_PAGOS B JOIN {environment}.BOLETOS_SAM C ON B.ID_BOLETO = C.ID_BOL JOIN {environment}.{table} A ON A.ID_BOL = C.ID_BOL WHERE to_char(B.F_VERIF,'YYYY-MM-DD') ='{partition_date}' AND \$CONDITIONS" --bindir '{zonda_dir}/sqoop/{database}/{table}' --target-dir '{data_lake_server}{landing_path}/partition_date={partition_date}' --compression-codec org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec --delete-target-dir --fields-terminated-by '|' --num-mappers 1 --password '{password}' --hive-delims-replacement ' ' --split-by "{split_field}" --verbose

sqoop import -Dmapreduce.output.basename={environment}_{table} -Dmapreduce.job.queuename=root.dataeng --connect 'jdbc:oracle:thin:@{serverName}:{port}/{service}'  --username '{username}' --query "SELECT A.COD_OPS,A.SECUENCIA,A.CONCEPTO,A.DBTO_CDTO,A.PORCENTAJE,A.COD_MONEDA,A.COTIZACION,A.IMPORTE_ORIGEN,A.IMPORTE_PESOS,A.MOVIM_CTA_REF,A.SEC_MOV_CTA,A.IMPORTE_DOLAR, to_char(B.F_VERIF, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as PARTITION_DATE FROM {environment}.{table} A JOIN {environment}.OPP_OPS_PAGOS B ON A.COD_OPS = B.COD_OPS WHERE to_char(B.F_VERIF, 'yyyy-MM-dd') >= to_char(to_date('{partition_date}','YYYY-MM-DD')-10,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND \$CONDITIONS" --bindir '{zonda_dir}/sqoop/{database}/{table}' --target-dir '{data_lake_server}{landing_path}/partition_date={partition_date}' --compression-codec org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec --delete-target-dir --fields-terminated-by '|' --num-mappers 1 --split-by '{split_field}'  --password '{password}' --verbose

sqoop import -Dmapreduce.output.basename={environment}_{table} -Dmapreduce.job.queuename=root.dataeng --connect 'jdbc:oracle:thin:@{serverName}:{port}/{service}' --username '{username}' --query "SELECT A.COD_OPS,A.TIPO,A.ID_SWIFT,A.NRO_FORM,A.IVA,A.ALICUOTA_IVA,A.GANANCIAS,A.MOTIVO_GAN,A.ALICUOTA_GAN,A.ACARGO_GAN,A.DOBLE_IMPOSICION,A.BANCO_DOMIC,A.BENEFICIARIO,A.BENEF_DOMIC,A.BENEF_CTA,A.SIS_ORIGEN,A.BCO_PAGADOR_CORRE,A.CTA_BCO_INT,A.GASTOS_CORRE,A.IMPORTE_GASTOS_CORRE,A.ES_BCO_BENEF,A.CAMPO70,A.TIPO_PERSONA,A.BANCO_RECEPTOR,A.TIPO_BANCO_RECEPTOR,A.BANCO_INTERMEDIARIO,A.TIPO_BANCO_INTERMEDIARIO,A.BANCO_BENEFICIARIO,A.TIPO_BANCO_BENEFICIARIO,A.ENVIO_MAIL,A.F_ENVIO_MAIL,A.DESC_GAN,A.BASEIMPO_IVA,A.BASEIMPO_GAN,A.FECHA_SWIFT,A.COD_GAN,A.BENEF_LOCALIDAD,A.SECUENCIA,A.TIPO_ANTERIOR,A.ALICUOTA_RUBRO,A.REF_CT,A.ID_ALICUOTA,A.EXENCION_GANANCIAS,A.INVERTIR_ACARGO_GAN,A.ID_NIF_GANANCIA,A.GAN_YA_EFECTUADA,A.GUID,A.SRP,A.INPI,A.ID_REGIMEN,A.CUIT_BENEF,A.ID_SWIFT199,A.FECHA_FACT, to_char(B.F_VERIF,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PARTITION_DATE FROM {environment}.{table} A JOIN {environment}.OPP_OPS_PAGOS B ON A.COD_OPS = B.COD_OPS WHERE to_char(B.F_VERIF,'YYYY-MM-DD') ='{partition_date}' AND \$CONDITIONS" --bindir '{zonda_dir}/sqoop/{database}/{table}' --target-dir '{data_lake_server}{landing_path}/fecha_fact={partition_date}' --compression-codec org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec --delete-target-dir --fields-terminated-by '|' --num-mappers 1 --password '{password}' --hive-delims-replacement ' ' --split-by "{split_field}" --verbose

sqoop import -Dmapreduce.output.basename={environment}_{table} -Dmapreduce.job.queuename=root.dataeng --connect 'jdbc:oracle:thin:@{serverName}:{port}/{service}' --username '{username}' --query "SELECT DISTINCT C.ID_SWIFT,C.BENEF,C.MONEDA,C.MONTO,C.ESTADO,C.NRO_OP,C.USUARIO,C.FMODIF,C.REFERENCIA,C.NRO_OPR,C.NROSWIFT,C.BANCO,C.FVALOR,C.TIPO_INGRESO,C.GPI,C.SRP,C.CUENTA,C.CON_FONDOS,C.FINGRESO_FONDOS,C.FECHA_FONDOS,C.FINGRESO,to_char(A.F_VERIF, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PARTITION_DATE FROM {environment}.OPP_OPS_PAGOS A JOIN {environment}.OPP_OPS B ON A.COD_OPS = B.COD_OPS JOIN {environment}.{table} C ON B.NRO_BANKTRADE = C.NRO_OP WHERE to_char(A.F_VERIF ,'YYYY-MM-DD') ='{partition_date}' AND \$CONDITIONS" --bindir '{zonda_dir}/sqoop/{database}/{table}' --target-dir '{data_lake_server}{landing_path}/partition_date={partition_date}' --compression-codec org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec --delete-target-dir --fields-terminated-by '|' --num-mappers 1 --password '{password}' --hive-delims-replacement ' ' --split-by "{split_field}" --verbose
